name: would you still love me if i was a worm?
name_original: would you still love me if i was a worm?
description:
made for Dogpit's cultivation jam

the love of your life has been turned into a worm! you still love them, of course, so you're going to help them with their  worm work!

use WASD or the arrow keys to move around and interact with things!

made with bitsy, plus i used the palettsy tool for colours
